tva:BasicDescription.tva:Title: We Are Never Ever Getting Back Together-Taylor Swift (cover) Megan Nicole
tva:BasicDescription.tva:Synopsis: Bea-utiful: smarturl.it Cover:itunes.apple.com Hope you enjoy :) definitely had some fun with this one...Special thanks to Jon for helping out, be sure to check out his channel he's a really nice cool dude haha and nothing like he acted like in this video...www.youtube.com **I edit most of my videos and I am very particular when﻿ it comes to the singing lining up. Something went wrong while the video was being processed on YouTube, sorry about that Also thanks to Annette, Eppic, and Joey! You can find me on... FACEBOOK: www.facebook.com TWITTER: www.twitter.com WEBSITE: www.megannicolemusic.com INSTAGRAM APP @megannicolemusic KEEK: MeganNicole "We Are Never Ever Getting Back Together" - originally by Taylor Swift Written by: Taylor Swift, Max Martin & Shellback Published by: Kobalt Music Publishing & Sony ATV Music Publishing

tva:Genre.tva:Name: Non-linear audio-video
tva:Genre.tva:Definition: Services where the interaction is based mostly around choosing alternate audio or video files - VOD and AOD, maybe combined with 2.1.1.15 (multi stream)

tva:HowRelated.tva:Name: Recommendation
tva:HowRelated.tva:Definition: The reference points to a resource recommended the provider of the current resource. The service provider considers there to be similarities between the currently described resource and the referenced resource. Example: This could provide access to previous or next episodes or to all episodes (the parent series as a whole). Suggestion to record a programme which the broadcaster recommends because of what the user is watching.It could also point to a Web site proposing related programmes ‘recommended’ by the service provider. A recommendation can be used to suggest content or services or services bundles with a similar subject.

tva:Review.tva:FreeTextReview: Very nice video, I love it!!!! You're so young, you have a bright future as a star,﻿ I await more of your videos =)
Soooo beautiful﻿ :)
Such an amazing cover! As aaaaalways!﻿
This﻿ is your BEST cover ever!!
ur amazin listened to this like 10 times taylor swift should sing you up! x keep posting videos ur a brilliant singer!﻿
Obsessed with﻿ this
your REALLY﻿ GOOD!!!
I'm pretty sure, maybe﻿ I was watching the wrong video than you were though, that his character was the one acting like a dick....
megan can﻿ you please do a cover of one direction's " another world " song please ?
love it! great﻿ video
She got signed by P﻿ Diddy!!!
Cool ur really good!﻿
Taylor Swift is good,﻿ YOU ARE BETTER
She's not that﻿ young lol
You have a very pretty voice, but i don't really like this cover I like taylors song more but she also wrote it and it's just Taylor But﻿ you do have talent!
The song fitted to her﻿ voice that's why she sounds amazing
So cute﻿ :)
This is honestly better than the﻿ official song
I download on my﻿ phone just MEGAN"S VERSION! NOT ORIGINAL. because i really like it more! <3
the ad was so cool.. it was like teaching you how﻿ to build lego.. :)
Somebody sign this girl﻿ she is soo talented
nice i﻿ like the room so much ,specially the song . :)+
Bu kadar tatlı olunmaz﻿ ki canım <3
But that was such a pretty﻿ pink shade of lipstick!
